recipes.name: oatmeal with strawberries
recipes.directions: Stir in oats, milk, and salt and cook, stirring frequently, until oatmeal is creamy and thickened, about 3 minutes. When done, mix in strawberries.

recipes.name: cereal
recipes.directions: Place cereal in a bowl and then add milk. It's not hard. Don't you dare put milk first.

recipes.name: salad
recipes.ingredients: romaine lettuce, tomatoes, carrots, cucumber, other vegetables, dressing
recipes.directions: Toss all vegetables until evenly spread. Then add dressing of your choosing.
